summary: Abandoned child workflows should not receive a cascading cancellation from their parent workflow. This aligns with Temporal's child workflow cancellation policy where abandoned children should be independent.
userImpact: Parent workflows incorrectly cancel abandoned child workflows, causing unexpected workflow terminations and potential data loss.
rootCause: Cancellation policy not correctly differentiating between normal child workflows and abandoned child workflows when propagating parent cancellation.
resolutionDetails: Implemented proper abandonment handling to prevent cascading cancellation to abandoned child workflows per the Temporal specification.
keyQuote: Abandoned Child Workflows should not receive a cascading Cancel from the parent
